behaviors.name: http:scan
behaviors.label: HTTP Scan
behaviors.description: IP has been reported for performing actions related to HTTP vulnerability scanning and discovery.

behaviors.name: http:exploit
behaviors.label: HTTP Exploit
behaviors.description: IP has been reported for attempting to exploit a vulnerability in a web application.

behaviors.name: http:bruteforce
behaviors.label: HTTP Bruteforce
behaviors.description: IP has been reported for performing a HTTP brute force attack (either generic HTTP probing or applicative related brute force).

behaviors.name: tcp:scan
behaviors.label: TCP Scan
behaviors.description: IP has been reported for performing TCP port scanning.

behaviors.name: http:spam
behaviors.label: Web form spam
behaviors.description: IP has been reported trying to perform spam via web forms/forums.

behaviors.name: http:crawl
behaviors.label: HTTP Crawl
behaviors.description: IP has been reported for performing aggressive crawling of web applications.

behaviors.name: http:dos
behaviors.label: HTTP DoS
behaviors.description: IP has been reported trying to perform denial of service attacks.

classifications.name: community-blocklist
classifications.label: CrowdSec Community Blocklist
classifications.description: IP belongs to the CrowdSec Community Blocklist

attack_details.name: crowdsecurity/http-sensitive-files
attack_details.label: Access to sensitive files over HTTP
attack_details.description: Detect attempt to access to sensitive files (.log, .db ..) or folders (.git)

attack_details.name: crowdsecurity/http-probing
attack_details.label: HTTP Probing
attack_details.description: Detect site scanning/probing from a single ip

attack_details.name: firewallservices/pf-scan-multi_ports
attack_details.label: PF Scan Multi Ports
attack_details.description: ban IPs that are scanning us

attack_details.name: crowdsecurity/http-sqli-probbing-detection
attack_details.label: SQL Injection Attempt
attack_details.description: A scenario that detects SQL injection probing with minimal false positives

attack_details.name: crowdsecurity/http-bad-user-agent
attack_details.label: Bad User Agent
attack_details.description: Detect usage of bad User Agent

attack_details.name: crowdsecurity/http-crawl-non_statics
attack_details.label: Aggressive Crawl
attack_details.description: Detect aggressive crawl on non static resources

attack_details.name: crowdsecurity/http-admin-interface-probing
attack_details.label: HTTP Admin Interface Probing
attack_details.description: Detect generic HTTP admin interface probing

attack_details.name: crowdsecurity/http-dos-swithcing-ua
attack_details.label: HTTP DOS with varying UA
attack_details.description: Detect DoS tools switching user-agent too fast

mitre_techniques.name: T1110
mitre_techniques.label: Brute Force
mitre_techniques.description: Adversaries may use brute force techniques to gain access to accounts when passwords are unknown or when password hashes are obtained.

mitre_techniques.name: T1595
mitre_techniques.label: Active Scanning
mitre_techniques.description: Adversaries may execute active reconnaissance scans to gather information that can be used during targeting.

mitre_techniques.name: T1190
mitre_techniques.label: Exploit Public-Facing Application
mitre_techniques.description: Adversaries may attempt to exploit a weakness in an Internet-facing host or system to initially access a network.

mitre_techniques.name: T1589
mitre_techniques.label: Gather Victim Identity Information
mitre_techniques.description: Adversaries may gather information about the victim's identity that can be used during targeting.

mitre_techniques.name: T1018
mitre_techniques.label: Remote System Discovery
mitre_techniques.description: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of other systems by IP address, hostname, or other logical identifier on a network that may be used for Lateral Movement from the current system.

mitre_techniques.name: T1046
mitre_techniques.label: Network Service Discovery
mitre_techniques.description: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of services running on remote hosts and local network infrastructure devices, including those that may be vulnerable to remote software exploitation.

mitre_techniques.name: T1498
mitre_techniques.label: Network Denial of Service
mitre_techniques.description: Adversaries may perform Network Denial of Service (DoS) attacks to degrade or block the availability of targeted resources to users.

references.name: list:firehol_cybercrime
references.label: Firehol cybercrime tracker list
references.description: CyberCrime, a project tracking command and control. This list contains command and control IP addresses.
